content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-20, -70)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-20.0, -70.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (-18.0, -70.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-20.5, -66.5) connected to transport belts and stone furnace at position (-19.0, -65.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (-19.0, -65.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-17.5, -64.5) connected to stone furnace at position (-19.0, -65.0) and wooden chest at position (-16.5, -64.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (-16.5, -64.5) containing iron plates
- BeltGroup connecting various entities in the facility

### Copper Ore Mining and Transport Facility at Position (-23, -68)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-23.0, -68.0) extracting copper ore
- Wooden Chest at position (-23.5, -69.5) storing extracted ores
- Transport Belts connecting the mining drill to other entities
- BeltGroup facilitating ore transport

### Iron Ore Mining Facility at Position (-14, -53)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0) extracting iron ore
- Wooden Chest at position (-12.5, -54.5) storing extracted ores
- Burner Inserter at position (-13.5, -54.5) moving ores to the chest
- Transport Belts connecting the mining drill to other entities
- BeltGroup facilitating ore transport

### Miscellaneous Structures
- Wooden Chest at position (52.5, -84.5) storing coal
- Burner Mining Drill at position (53.0, -83.0) extracting coal
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Wooden Chest at position (1.5, 0.5) storing coal and iron plates
- Burner Inserter at position (2.5, 0.5) connected to wooden chests

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### TypeError in Code Execution
- Ensure that all required arguments are provided when calling functions. In this case, the function `_modifier()` is missing a required positional argument 'args'. Double-check the function signature and provide the necessary arguments.
